tasks.label: Qdrant: up (docker compose)
args: $ErrorActionPreference = 'Stop'; if (-not (Test-Path 'docker-compose.yml')) { throw 'docker-compose.yml not found in workspace root.' }; $composeKind = $null; try { docker compose version *> $null; $composeKind = 'docker compose' } catch {}; if (-not $composeKind) { try { docker-compose version *> $null; $composeKind = 'docker-compose' } catch {} }; if (-not $composeKind) { throw 'Docker Compose not found. Install/enable Docker Desktop.' }; if ($composeKind -eq 'docker compose') { docker compose up -d qdrant } else { docker-compose up -d qdrant }
